name: Hereditary Spherocytosis
chief_complaint: I've been feeling very tired lately, and my skin looks yellowish.
prognosis: Good with proper management; most patients live normal lives with treatment
description: Hereditary spherocytosis is an inherited disorder of the red blood cell membrane that causes spherical-shaped RBCs, leading to hemolysis, anemia, and jaundice. The abnormal RBCs are destroyed prematurely in the spleen.
